thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 17 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-GetBack Shareholders Agree To Issue Up To 50 Mln Shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-GetBack Shareholders Agree To Issue Up To 50 Mln Shares
text:
April 17 (Reuters) - GETBACK SA:
* SHAREHOLDERS AGREE TO ISSUE UP TO 50 MILLION SHARES WITHIN TARGET CAPITAL, CO SAYS IN A STATEMENT
* BOARD TO BE ABLE TO ISSUE NEW SHARES IF PRIVATE SUBSCRIPTION FOR SERIES F SHARES IS COMPLETED
* NEW SHARESâ€™ ISSUE PRICE CANNOT BE LOWER THAN SERIES F ISSUE PRICE, WHICH WAS SET FOR NOT LOWER THAN 10 ZLOTY PER SHARE
* ON TUESDAY WARSAW STOCK EXCHANGE RESOLVED TO SUSPEND TRADING OF CO SHARES AND BONDS ON THE REQUEST OF THE POLISH FINANCIAL SUPERVISOR KNF
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
